snippet: The Transportation Department said Tuesday that the nation’s biggest airlines achieved an on-time arrival rating of 79.6 percent in April.
lead_paragraph: The Transportation Department said Tuesday that the nation’s biggest airlines achieved an on-time arrival rating of 79.6 percent in April.

headline.main: Nation’s Airlines Improved On-Time Arrivals in April
headline.print_headline: Nation’s Airlines Improved On-Time Arrivals In April
